posts.postText: We need one. Whenever I go onto the server there are normally one or two people afk, which isn't much. But its normally when the server is full, so it blocks others from joining
yeah and votekicks borked so i cant kick people if i see them afk

I second this, I was on today, and there was 4 AFK's
Left server so others could get on, andI had other things to do.
! would love to kick them using !votekick but it's fucking broken D:, and even if we slap/slay them it wouldnt make a difference they would sstill be able to get points/hog the server.
